row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_CONNECTION_DETAILS
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Action" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_ACTION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "OS Customization Spec name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_OS_SPECNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Description" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_DESCRIPTION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DNS Server" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_DNS_SERVER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DNS Suffix" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_DNS_SUFFIX#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Naming Scheme" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_SCHEME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Naming Prefix" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_PREFIX#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!------------------------------------ Powershell script for the action -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- try { ! Connect to the server : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "CONNECT CMD: &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
! DECRYPT PASSWORD : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Executing Connect to vCenter cmdlets $connect_obj = &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# -Password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD -Force try { ! ------------------------------------Prepare PowerCLI commandlet----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! OS SPEC NAME : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_OS_SPECNAME# ! ACTION : IF &UC4RB_VSP_ACTION# = "CREATESPEC" : SET &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# = "New-OSCustomizationSpec -Name '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' -OSType 'Linux'" : ELSE $Getspec = Get-OSCustomizationSpec -Name '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' IF ($Getspec.count -ne 1){ throw 'Cound not found exactly one OS CustomizationSpec.' } if ($Getspec.OSType -ne 'Linux'){ throw 'Specified OS CustomizationSpec is not type of Linux.' } : SET &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# = "Set-OSCustomizationSpec -OSCustomizationSpec $Getspec" : ENDIF
! TYPE : SET &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# = STR_CAT(&MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC#," -Type 'Persistent'")
! DOMAIN : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN# : SET &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# = STR_CAT(&MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC#," -Domain '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'")
! DESCRIPTION : IF &UC4RB_VSP_DESCRIPTION# <>"" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DESCRIPTION# : SET &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# = STR_CAT(&MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC#," -Description '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'") : ENDIF
! Declaring empty hashtable $dns_entries = @{} ! DNS SERVER : IF &UC4RB_VSP_DNS_SERVER# <>"" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DNS_SERVER# $dns_server = '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' $dns_serverlist = $dns_server.split(",") $dns_entries = @{'DnsServer' = $dns_serverlist} : ENDIF
! DNS SUFFIX : IF &UC4RB_VSP_DNS_SUFFIX# <>"" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DNS_SUFFIX# $dns_suffix = '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' $dns_suffixlist = $dns_suffix.split(",") $dns_entries.add('DnsSuffix',$dns_suffixlist) : ENDIF
! NAMING SCHEME : IF &UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_SCHEME# <> "NOTSPECIFIED" : SET &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# = STR_CAT(&MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC#," -NamingScheme '&UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_SCHEME#'") : ENDIF
! NAMING PREFIX : IF &UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_PREFIX# <>"" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_PREFIX# : SET &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# = STR_CAT(&MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC#," -NamingPrefix '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'") : ENDIF
! LOGGING GET-STAT CMDLETS Write-host &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# @dns_entries
! EXECUTING MANAGE LINUX OS SPEC CMDLETS &MANAGE_LINUX_OSSPEC# @dns_entries -Confirm:$false } finally { try { ! Disconnect from the server if connection is establish : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "DISCONNECT CMD: &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET# } catch { Write-Host "Unable to disconnect from the server." Write-Host "INFO: $($error[0].Exception.Message)" } } } catch { $errors = 1 Write-Host "ERROR: $($error[0].Exception.Message)" }
!-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ !Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** MANAGE LINUX OS CUSTOMIZATION SPEC ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** MANAGE LINUX OS CUSTOMIZATION SPEC ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_ERRORSTATUS
